author: andschwa
body: Resolves failure seen in #1028 [here](https://ci.appveyor.com/project/PowerShell/powershell/build/0.4.0.2057#L1298). --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/powershell/powershell/1030)

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: `s/remote/remove/g` in the branch name... oh well.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: I think this is good. Followed the same pattern as the ones we did yesterday @JamesWTruher; merging to unblock.

comments.author: JamesWTruher
comments.body:
just one problem
line 51 in Remove-TypeData.Tests.ps1
`$null = $ps.AddScript("(Get-TypeData System.Int32).TypeName").Invoke() | Should Be System.Int32`
doesn't really make sense. It should probably be:
`$ps.AddScript("(Get-TypeData System.Int32).TypeName").Invoke() | Should Be System.Int32`

title: Isolate Remove-TypeData tests with runspace
